CIPHER.125.cipherString: Keep a government poor and weak and it's your servant; when it is rich and powerful it becomes your master.
CIPHER.125.question: Solve this quote by H. Beam Piper that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher. What does it say?
CIPHER.125.author: H. Beam Piper

CIPHER.126.cipherString: He that first cries out stop thief is often he that has stolen the treasure.
CIPHER.126.question: William Congreve offers an observation that has been encoded as a Complete Columnar. You are told that the quote has CRIES OUT somewhere in it. What does it say?
CIPHER.126.author: William Congreve

CIPHER.132.cipherString: Man when not stimulated by hope or necessity is naturally a lazy animal.
CIPHER.132.question: A famous phrase has been encoded as a Porta using a keyword of SLUGGISH. What does it say?

CIPHER.129.cipherString: If human beings had genuine courage, they'd wear their costumes every day of the year, not just on Halloween.
CIPHER.129.question: A phrase by Douglas Coupland has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher with a K1 alphabet. What was the K1 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.129.author: Douglas Coupland

CIPHER.140.cipherString: Clay can be dirt in the wrong hands, but clay can be art in the right hands.
CIPHER.140.question: Lupita Nyong'o offers us some advice that has been encoded as a Nihilist Substitution with a keyword of MOLD and polybius key of MANIFESTATIVE. What does it say?
CIPHER.140.author: Lupita Nyong'o

CIPHER.127.cipherString: As we see it, a choice is not something you do today in isolation; it is part of a plan that includes some choices to be made in the future.
CIPHER.127.question: You came across the following written on a wall in a cave. You notice that it's a quote by Kenneth Arrow encoded as a Patristocrat using a K2 alphabet. You think that XGCXE in the middle of the second line probably represents the words A PLAN, and that it's followed by a four-letter word. What does it say?
CIPHER.127.author: Kenneth Arrow

CIPHER.128.cipherString: Friends should always tell you the truth. But please don't.
CIPHER.128.question: The following odd symbols were found when a tomb was opened, but you recognized it as a prankster who scratched a quote by Louis C.K. on the wall using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?
CIPHER.128.author: Louis C.K.

CIPHER.131.cipherString: Edjucation haz in America's hole hisstry bin the major hope for improoving thee individual and society.
CIPHER.131.question: A famous (and relevant!) phrase by Gunnar Myrdal has been encoded as an Aristocrat using a K1 alphabet. Unfortunately, the person who wrote it down is just horrible at spelling. The letter i is in it a whole bunch of times. And you're pretty sure the ciphertext Z corresponds to plaintext D. What does it say?
CIPHER.131.author: Gunnar Myrdal

CIPHER.130.cipherString: Hope as rich and green as the trees of an oasis.
CIPHER.130.question: A quote by Dawud Wharnsby has been encoded using the Baconian Cipher for you to decode. What does it say?
CIPHER.130.author: Dawud Wharnsby

CIPHER.133.cipherString: Las barcas son muy √∫tiles para cruzar grandes distancias por el agua, ya que van m√°s r√°pido que t√∫ a nado o andando.
CIPHER.133.question: Decrypt the following cipher text in Spanish about transportation from the Gu√≠a de Estrategias para Minecrafters that has been encoded using the Xenocrypt Cipher with a K1 alphabet and an English keyword. What does it say?

CIPHER.134.question: A message by V. S. Naipaul encrypted with a keyword of JILT with the Hill cipher has been received. What does it say?
CIPHER.134.author: V. S. Naipaul

CIPHER.135.cipherString: Fiction is obliged to stick to possibilities. Truth isn't.
CIPHER.135.question: Mark Twain has been heard to say the following phrase that has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse cipher. You are told that the quote has OBLIGE in it corresponding to the encoded text W N F S R R I U, meaning F = ‚óè‚óè‚óè; I = ‚Äì‚Äì‚óè; N = ‚Äì√ó‚Äì; R = ‚óè‚óè√ó; S = √ó‚óè‚Äì; U = √ó‚óè√ó; W = √ó‚Äì‚Äì. What does it say?
CIPHER.135.author: Mark Twain

CIPHER.136.cipherString: Every second of every day has its own magic.
CIPHER.136.question: Upon searching a room, the following were found on scraps of paper. You realize it's a quote by Anthony Doerr encoded as a Baconian. You are told that the cipher text towards the end of the first line: AT THE WORST TOWNS. SEND A decodes to be SECO. What does it say?
CIPHER.136.author: Anthony Doerr

CIPHER.137.cipherString: Beware of those who want to convince you that it is impossible to strive for good just because it is impossible to reach perfection.
CIPHER.137.question: The following cautionary quote from A Calendar of Wisdom that contains POSSIBLE twice needs to be decoded with the Patristocrat cipher using a K1 alphabet. What does it say?
CIPHER.137.author: A Calendar of Wisdom

CIPHER.138.question: Solve this phrase that has been encoded using the Cryptarithm Cipher. What do the values 176 43086 941619286 decode to?

CIPHER.139.cipherString: At the Supreme Court, those who know don't talk, and those who talk don't know, Ginsburg was fond of saying.
CIPHER.139.question: Decrypt the following cipher text that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher using a K2 alphabet. It contains a recognizable proper name. What does it say?

CIPHER.141.cipherString: Deliberate with caution, but act with decision; and yield with graciousness, or oppose with firmness.
CIPHER.141.question: Charles Caleb Colton offers us some advice that has been encoded as a K2 Aristocrat. It contains the word YIELD. What does it say?
CIPHER.141.author: Charles Caleb Colton

CIPHER.142.cipherString: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
CIPHER.142.question: Solve this quote by Helen Keller that has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher. You are told that the quote has NEVER LOSE somewhere in it. What does it say?
CIPHER.142.author: Helen Keller

CIPHER.143.cipherString: Look, I learned from your uncle that when the universe turns out to be insane, the wise man embraces insanity.
CIPHER.143.question: Someone passed you a piece of paper with this Aristocrat encoded quote by Bradley Denton using a K2 alphabet. What was the K2 Key Phrase used to encode it?
CIPHER.143.author: Bradley Denton

CIPHER.144.cipherString: Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.
CIPHER.144.question: Solve this quote by Neelam Saxena Chandra that has been encoded using the Fractionated Morse Cipher. You are told that the quote has FALL D in it corresponding to the encoded text Y R T T A R C D W, meaning A = ‚óè‚óè√ó; C = ‚óè√ó√ó; D = ‚Äì‚óè‚óè; R = ‚óè‚Äì‚óè; T = √ó‚óè‚Äì; W = √ó‚Äì‚Äì; Y = √ó√ó‚óè. What does it say?
CIPHER.144.author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

CIPHER.145.cipherString: My love for the water would always be tempered by respect for dangers that must never be underestimated.
CIPHER.145.question: Solve this quote by Lewis Pugh that has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher. What does it say?
CIPHER.145.author: Lewis Pugh

CIPHER.146.question: Decrypt the following cipher text that has been encoded using the Cryptarithm Cipher. What do the values 520 204975 10843201 decode to?

CIPHER.147.cipherString: Forgiveness really is so misunderstood, as well as the power it can release in an individual.
CIPHER.147.question: Someone passed you a piece of paper with this Aristocrat encoded quote by Jennifer O'Neill. What does it say?
CIPHER.147.author: Jennifer O'Neill

CIPHER.148.cipherString: The man who says he can, and the man who says he can not, are both correct
CIPHER.148.question: Confucius offers an observation that has been encoded as a Nihilist Substitution with a keyword of DUALITY and polybius key of RIGHTEOUSNESS. What does it say?
CIPHER.148.author: Confucius

CIPHER.149.cipherString: That's the problem with memories: you can visit them, but you can't live in them.
CIPHER.149.question: Solve this quote by Shaun David Hutchinson that has been encoded using the Porta Cipher using a keyword of PAST. What does it say?
CIPHER.149.author: Shaun David Hutchinson

CIPHER.150.question: Mahalia Jackson was often heard to say the following phrase which has been encoded as a Hill with a keyword of RICH. What does it say?
CIPHER.150.author: Mahalia Jackson

CIPHER.151.cipherString: No matter what his rank or position may be, the lover of books is the richest and happiest of the children of men.
CIPHER.151.question: A quote by J. A. Langford about delight has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher using a K3 alphabet for you to decode. What was the K3 Keyword used to encode it?
CIPHER.151.author: J. A. Langford

CIPHER.152.cipherString: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
CIPHER.152.question: Mark Twain offers an insightful observation about human qualities that has been encoded as an Aristocrat. What does it say?
CIPHER.152.author: Mark Twain
